flavorText.text:
ジェットスキーに　まけない　そくどで
およぐ。つばさの　へりは　するどく
りゅうひょうを　せつだんする。

クチバシから　のびている　３ぼんの
ツノは　つよさの　しょうちょう。
リーダーが　いちばん　おおきい。

ジェットスキーに　まけない　そくどで
およぐ。つばさの　へりは　するどく
りゅうひょうを　せつだんする。

クチバシから　のびている　３ぼんの
ツノは　つよさの　しょうちょう。
リーダーが　いちばん　おおきい。

제트스키와 맞먹는 속도로
헤엄친다. 날개 가장자리는
날카롭게 유빙을 절단한다.

부리에서 늘어난 3개의 뿔은
강하다는 것을 증명한다.
리더의 뿔이 제일 크다.

제트스키와 맞먹는 속도로
헤엄친다. 날개 가장자리는
날카롭게 유빙을 절단한다.

부리에서 늘어난 3개의 뿔은
강하다는 것을 증명한다.
리더의 뿔이 제일 크다.

S’il voit son honneur bafoué, il
est capable de faire des ravages
avec ses ailes tranchantes.

S’il voit son honneur bafoué, il
est capable de faire des ravages
avec ses ailes tranchantes.

Il nage aussi vite qu’un hors-bord. Le tranchant de
ses ailes peut fendre un bloc de glace à la dérive.

Les trois cornes de son bec sont le symbole de sa
force. Celles du chef sont plus grosses que les autres.

Il nage aussi vite qu’un hors-bord. Le tranchant de ses ailes
peut fendre un bloc de glace à la dérive.

Les trois cornes de son bec sont le symbole de sa force.
Celles du chef sont plus grosses que les autres.

Es schwimmt so schnell wie ein Rennboot. Seine Flügel
haben scharfe Seiten und können Packeis schneiden.

Die drei Hörner, die aus dem Schnabel wachsen,
stehen für Kraft. Ein Anführer hat die größten Hörner.

Es schwimmt so schnell wie ein Rennboot. Seine Flügel haben
scharfe Seiten und können Packeis schneiden.

Die drei Hörner, die aus dem Schnabel wachsen,
stehen für Kraft. Ein Anführer hat die größten Hörner.

Nada tan rápido como un fueraborda. Con los
afilados bordes de sus alas puede cortar el hielo.

Los tres cuernos de su pico son muestra de su fuerza.
El líder tiene los cuernos más grandes.

Nada tan rápido como un fueraborda. Con los afilados bordes
de sus alas puede cortar el hielo.

Los tres cuernos de su pico son muestra de su fuerza.
El líder tiene los cuernos más grandes.

Nuota veloce come una moto d’acqua. Le estremità
delle ali sono aguzze e spaccano anche il ghiaccio.

Le tre corna che si allungano dal suo becco attestano
la sua forza. Il capogruppo ha le corna più grosse.

Nuota veloce come una moto d’acqua. Le estremità delle ali
sono aguzze e spaccano anche il ghiaccio.

Le tre corna che si allungano dal suo becco attestano la sua
forza. Il capogruppo ha le corna più grosse.

The three horns that extend from
its beak attest to its power. The
leader has the biggest horns.

It swims as fast as a jet boat.
The edges of its wings are sharp
and can slice apart drifting ice.

If anyone were to hurt its pride,
it would slash them with wings that
can cleave through an ice floe.

It avoids unnecessary disputes,
but it will decimate anything that
threatens its pride.

It avoids unnecessary disputes,
but it will decimate anything that
threatens its pride.

If anyone were to hurt its pride,
it would slash them with wings that
can cleave through an ice floe.

If anyone were to hurt its pride,
it would slash them with wings that
can cleave through an ice floe.

If anyone were to hurt its pride,
it would slash them with wings that
can cleave through an ice floe.

If anyone were to hurt its pride,
it would slash them with wings that
can cleave through an ice floe.

It swims as fast as a jet boat. The edges of its
wings are sharp and can slice apart drifting ice.

The three horns that extend from its beak attest to
its power. The leader has the biggest horns.

It swims as fast as a jet boat. The edges of its
wings are sharp and can slice apart drifting ice.

The three horns that extend from its beak attest to
its power. The leader has the biggest horns.

Since ancient times, it has been revered by the people of Hisui,
who call it the Master of the Waves. Its wings are a match for
even master-crafted blades.
